entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 31. POP 30%
